StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetTakeOneCardLoca.onsBySector]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@SectorID uniqueiden..er, @FY int
AS BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT tol.ID, tol.TakeOneCardID, tol.Loca.onName, tol.LocStreet1, tol.CityCode, tol.CountyCode, tol.StateCode, tol.ZipCode, tol.ContactFirstName, tol.ContactLastName, tol.ContactMiddleIni.al, tol.ContactTitle, tol.Phone, tol.EmailAddress, tol.Stock, tolr.RestockDate, tolr.StockAdded, tol.IsAc.ve, toc.FY, toc.DatePrepared FROM RSSOSS.USMC.TakeOneLoca.on tol INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.TakeOneCard toc on TOL.TakeOneCardID = toc.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.TakeOneLoca.onRestock tolr on tolr.TakeOneLoca.onID = tol.ID and tolr.ID = (select MAX(tolr2.ID) from RSSOSS.USMC.TakeOneLoca.onRestock tolr2 where tolr2.TakeOneLoca.onID = tol.ID) WHERE toc.SectorID = @SectorID and tol.IsAc.ve = 1 and toc.FY = @FY
END
